 2017-06022017-06-02TBS,  OAG,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Auditors to the Public Sector Pension Investment Board
PrecisOrder Appointing (1) DELOITTE LLP of Montréal, Québec as AUDITOR of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2017; and (2) AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
